input: Mark didn't like leaving his dog on a leash outside and preferred the cage because the _ was dangerous.
Elena went to Mexico on vacation and brought back a poncho for Sarah. _ was thankful.
It is easier to start playing a flute than a violin because the _ is a lot easier to tune.
Jennifer had larger feet than Emily so _ always had a harder time finding high heeled shoes.
Elena wanted to friend Maria on Facebook, but she didn't have an account. _ helped her set one up.
After the awful car accident Christopher begged Kevin for forgiveness about the car, because _ felt responsible.
